title: Coherent collision integrals for neutrino transport equations
abstract:
We present quantum kinetic equations for neutrinos and derive Feynman rules
for computing scattering rates involving coherent states. Our rules encompass
both flavour- and particle-antiparticle coherence and allow writing down the
scattering matrix elements and collision integrals with the same intuitive ease
as with the usual non-coherent Feynman rules. Our results are useful for
computing collision rates that arise routinely in the context of coherently
mixing neutrinos with arbitrary masses. We give several explicit examples,
including some collision integrals for coherently mixing neutrinos in
supernovae.
